english.segment1: And love. Is not the easy thing. The only baggage. That you can bring. Not the easy thing. The only baggage you can bring. Is all that you can't leave behind
english.segment2: . And if the darkness is to keep us apart. And if the daylight feels like it's a long way off. And if your glass heart should crack. And for a second you turn back. Oh no, be strong
english.segment3: . Walk on. Walk on. What you got, they can't steal it. No they can't even feel it
english.segment4: . Walk on. Walk on. Stay safe tonight
english.segment5: . You're packing a suitcase for a place. None of us has been. A place that has to be believed. To be seen
english.segment6: . You could have flown away. A singing bird. In an open cage. Who will only fly. Only fly for freedom
english.segment7: . Walk on. Walk on. What you got. You can't deny it. Can't sell it or buy it
english.segment8: . Walk on. Walk on. You stay safe tonight
english.segment9: . And I know it aches. How your heart it breaks. You can only take so much
english.segment11: . Home. Hard to know what it is. If you never had one
english.segment12: . Home. I can't say where it is. But I know I'm going
english.segment13: . Home. That's where the hurt is
english.segment14: . And I know it aches. And your heart it breaks. You can only take so much. Walk on
english.segment15: . Leave it behind. You've got to leave it behind
english.segment16: . All that you fashion. All that you make. All that you build. All that you break
english.segment17: . All that you measure. All that you feel. All this you can leave behind
english.segment18: . All that you reason. All that you care. (It's only time. And I'll never fill up all I find)
english.segment19: . All that you sense. All that you scheme. All you dress up. And all that you see
english.segment20: |:. All you create. All that you wreck. All that you hate
